page.title: 12RELIGION -THE VICAR
page.content: {Mr.Boultbee}has been at St.Merryn church for six years now and he likes it very much. Before he became a vicar he was a business man.He has been a vicar at Truro, Coverack, Helston and now at St.Merryn. He says that being a vicar is a 50/50 job, sometimes hard and somtimes easy. Mr. Boultbee thinks that more people are becoming religious, although it is still not many people it is an improvement.The church congregation is more than keeping pace with natural wasteage. Mr.Boultbee was amazed recently to discover that there have been several vicars in his family. He has always believed in God but only made a firm comittment some 31 years ago.
